name: DUO!
description:
DUO! is old school 2 player game that you can play with your friend on the same computer. It has nice looking low poly models but the gameplay is really challenging and fun. Don't get too mad at your friend if he dies.

CONTROLS

Player 1:

  • WASD - Move
  • Spacebar - Jump

Player 2:

  • Arrows - Move
  • Enter - Jump

MADE BY Miha Prezelj
